trans-unit.source: Populates <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> objects with XML Schema data type definitions for .NET Framework types that are serialized using SOAP encoding.
SOAP encoding of SOAP Web service messages is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class provides a programmatic representation of an XML Schema definition language (XSD) document.
You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter"></xref> class, which supplies the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> objects to which XML Schema element declarations are to be added.
You should not create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
A collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> objects to which element declarations obtained from type mappings are to be added.
Adds to the applicable <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
Adds to the applicable <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
`true` to export a type definition for the parent element of the WSDL parts; otherwise, `false`.
Adds to the applicable <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object a data type definition for a .NET Framework type.
You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
An internal mapping between a .NET Framework type and an XML Schema element.
